title: Street Artist Yasuo. Yes plz.
body:
I do not play Yasuo a lot, but hell, would I love to see this skin come into the game. I would not only start trying to get good at him, I would buy this skin and reck people with my paintbrush sword skills. XD

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/C42iW9nWcAAh-MX.jpg:large

Did not make this picture.

replies.body: I would've liked Street Sweeper Yasuo, and he just bonks everyone with a broom.

He looks just like one of my classmates. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
